channel.title: I-280 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in I-280 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-101 North at I-280/I-1680 Split (Exit 384)
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 384. I-680/I-280 split on offramp. Use I-280 for Downtown San Jose. Use I-680 for Sacramento.

item.title: US-101 North - Exit 384 and Exit 385
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 384 - I-280/Downtown San Jose/I-680/Sacramento. Approaching Exit 385 - Story Road. US-101 north continues to San Francisco.

item.title: US-101 North - Exit 384 and Exit 385
item.description: US-101 north approaching Exit 384 - I-280/Downtown San Jose/I-680/Sacramento. Approaching Exit 385 - Story Road. US-101 continues north to San Francisco.

item.title: US-101 North - Exit 383 and Exit 384
item.description: US-101 north at Exit 383 - Tully Road. Approaching Exit 384 - I-280/I-680.

item.title: I-280 South - Exit 47B
item.description: I-280 south approaching Exit 47B - CA-1 South/Pacifica. CA-1 joins I-280 briefly here north to San Francisco.

item.title: I-280 South - Exit 50 and Exit 49
item.description: I-280 south at Exit 50 - CA-82/CA-1 North/San Jose Ave./Mission St. Approaching Exit 49 - Junipero Serra Blvd./John Daly Blvd. Overhead for I-280/CA-1 South/Pacifica/San Jose.

item.title: US-101 South - Exit 430A
item.description: US-101 south approaching Exit 430A - I-280 South/Daly City. Overhead for US-101 south to San Jose.
